channel.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Cult in the Jungle Republic!
This is a multiball setup (again :wink:) where the mafia and the cult must compete against each other to win. ## Mechanics • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority. There is no day one lynch, and day one ends when all players have confirmed. • Both the mafia and the cult have a night chat, but do not have a day chat. • Cultists win 1v1v1 scenarios, and equal numbered mafia and cult with no townies scenarios. • There are no wills/journals. ### Night Actions Order • The **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** investigates their target, finding out if they are a member of **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** or not. • The night kill targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** become immune to being recruited by the cult. • A **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** attempts to recruit their target. It will only succeed if they are a **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** that is *not* the target of a night kill. • The targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** are killed. ## Rolelist **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] x4** **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color] x12** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can't be recruited into the cult. **Factional Kill (Night)** - Each night phase, a mafia member may perform the factional kill. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when a majority of the living players are mafia, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=magenta]Cultist[/color] > **Recruit (Night)** - You may recruit a player at night. You may only recruit citizens. If you recruit anyone else or a nightkill target, your recruit will fail. There can only ever be at most four cultists, including dead cultists. *You win when a majority of the living players are cultists, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=lime]Cop[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Investigate (Night)** - Each night phase, you may investigate one player. You will get results back in the form of Mafia/Not Mafia (Cultists appear as Not Mafia). *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Shoot (Day/Night)** - Once per day/night cycle, you may kill a player. A day/night cycle is determined by the number in Day or Night. For instance, Day 2 and Night 2 are in the same day/night cycle. Night 2 and Day 3 are in different day/night cycles. You can not kill a player on Day 1. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* ## Player List & Graveyard 1. htm - Died D6 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 2. Firekitten - Died D3 - **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** 3. Celeste - Died N2 - **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** 4. Sam17z - Died D2 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 5. Hippolytus - Died N1 - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 6. [color=gray]~~CaptainNerbins~~[/color] Captain - Died D7 - **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** 7. Memesky - Died N7 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 8. MaximusPrime - Died D4 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 9. **Whammerist** - **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** 10. Marluxion - Died N1 - **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** 11. [color=gray]~~Insanity~~[/color] **Marcus** - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 12. **Shurian** - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 13. [color=gray]~~Pug~~[/color] [Pug's Slot] - Died N5 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 14. Vulgard - Dayvigged D2 - **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color]** 15. **PokemonKidRyan** - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 16. Solic - Died N3 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 17. [color=gray]~~ElectricTaco~~[/color] Icibalus - Died 'N4' - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 18. **Wolfy** - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 19. PoisonedSquid- Died N6 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]**

item.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
Yeah, town at this point was hoping maf would hit cult. Sadly, inactivity meant they couldn’t read as they should’ve. I mean maybe we could’ve pushed PKR a bit more when his “cult” read on Ici was shown to be bogus, but I thought killing someone he FOSed was indicative of him being maf>cult so idk

Read full topic

item.description:
Yeah which is why I converted you cuz you weren’t gonna get killed lol. I thought you said it was cuz u were travelling and I figured maf were unlikely to kill u cuz of that.

Essentially I wanted a good player who wasn’t gonna be night killed and u were the only one.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Hippolytus:

switched to Wolfy cuz he was super quiet at the time

BOI!!!

Have ypu seen every game I play? I always tend to be quiet Day 1 as people meme around unless they properly generate discussions. There was barely an attempt and was busy that day!

Read full topic
item.source: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!

item.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Yeh icis logic as to why I would convert you was right aswell lol. I switched to Wolfy cuz he was super quiet at the time but is also a very good player so wasn’t gonna get lynched for inactivity (esp when pkr was playing lol). Plus he’s often a dark horse so I figured just a generally reliable choice.

also I didn’t see pkr was playing so was gonna convert and bus Wolfy cuz they’re basically the same person

Read full topic
item.source: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!

item.title: Cult in the Jungle Republic - Cult Wins!
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
On his wagon was 3 cult 1 mafia and 1 new player. He hardly got himself lynched. Him trying to lead was the right play for him - either that or let the 3 cultists lead. I do think it’s always good to encourage ppl to try be more confident tho, it can be very hard to with so many good players around.

Read full topic
